item.title: New Year, New Domain, New Design
item.author: Kevin Sookocheff
item.description:
Well the New Year is upon us and I decided to take a fresh approach to this website. I’ve migrated to a new domain and re-written the site from the ground up using DocPad and Bootstrap.

I’ve migrated the existing comments (and maybe lost a few) but haven’t bothered to redirect any old posts to their new home. I’m definitely starting fresh!
